data.text: @esthervdoorn Hola Esther, we replied to your DM. Regards.

@katefroehlich46 You can call to Serviberia, in the following link you will find the available number for your country https://t.co/ci7QjJwKET and our colleagues can give you the available options. Thank you.
@katefroehlich46 Hola Kate, Please consult directly with our luggage colleagues through the following line +34 901 111 342. Kind regards.
@Marxs_carpark Hello, we replied. Thank you.
@OmnipotentMeesh https://t.co/HyIAB652lE
@OmnipotentMeesh Hola, could you give us the details of the problem, your booking and complete name please? Thank you.
@Marxs_carpark https://t.co/HyIAB652lE
@Marxs_carpark Hello Trevor, could you send us your telephone number with the international prefix, from where are you trying to call, your booking code, and your complete name? Thank you.

@hollymcquillan Hola Holly. Please provide us your irregularity part (PIR) code, full name, email adress and  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI so we'd be able to consult from here. We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards
@MikeGerber should be able to assist you for the management you want to carry out. We are attentive to any news through this channel, regards. /2

@MikeGerber Hola Mike, we remind you that it is not allowed to take photographs of our collaborators without their authorization. So we suggest not sharing the images. Regarding your query we understand that our colleagues /1
@Nice_hit_eh Hola, we have reviewed your query privately and we have answered you with detailed information. We remain at your disposal for any new query, regards.

@santividal3 Hola Santi, we are sorry that you have this inconvenience. If in the next few minutes you do not receive the required assistance we suggest in the meantime try to carry out the check-in from our mobile App. We are attentive to news, regards.

@bernardfok Hola Bernard, we understand that you should have been able to open a claim at the relevant airport. Could you tell us if this has been the case? you should have a reference PIR number for the follow-up of your case. We remain pendant for DM, Regards.  https://t.co/HyIAB652lE

@christycruz33 Hola Chrisy, we have responded to you by DM and we credit you with additional information in relation to your case. We appreciate your patience, we are attentive to any updates, regards.
@RStewart20 Hola, Hello, we have answered you in that way. We are attentive to your comments, regards.
@Da_Gem_In_I Hola, we have requested information about your claim by DM, for the moment we are waiting for your messages. Regards.
@ChilliBom Hola, we have reviewed your query and answered by that same means. At the moment we are attentive to your answer, regards.

@zaibb76 Hola, we are sorry that you have had this inconvenience, if you have not been able to establish the desired communication we would like you to indicate the reason for your consultation by DM to verify how we could assist you, regards. https://t.co/HyIAB652lE
@christycruz33 Hola Christy. We're sorry to read this. When did you open your claim? Could you indicate us when did you open your claim? Please let us know.
@katefroehlich46 Hola Kate. We're sorry to read this. We understand you have opened a claim with our colleagues at the airport to report your missing luggage, is that correct?
@RStewart20 We have answered to your DM, Ross. Regards
@ChilliBom Could you provide us more details about your booking process through private message so that we may verify? We remain at your disposal. Regards
@ChilliBom Hola. What number are you trying to contact to and where are you calling us from? Please let us know. Regards
@citrikp Hola, we're very sorry and have just replied your DMs. Best regards
@TonyaB75 Hola Tonya, sorry for the inconvenience. We've replied your DMs
@RStewart20 Hola Ross, please re-send the DM, as we haven't received it https://t.co/HyIAB652lE

@sarambas91 We're sorry to read this, Stefan. Unfortunately, there isn't any update about your bag's location and its delivery. Please use our tracing system to follow up https://t.co/P60eOiuUxP . Kind regards
@DaniGarciaGonz Hola, ¿nos podrías escribir un DM con todos los detalles y el número de reclamación si lo tienes? Muchas gracias.
@jacquesphotoz Hola Jacques. We've replied your new DMs with instructions on how Sara can move on with her case, if the bag isn`t delivered within the next 48h. Kind regards
@NotImpressedt Hola, please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...) https://t.co/HyIAB652lE
@mgeiras Hola Martín, ¿podrías enviarnos tu número de bono y tu email por MD, por favor? Saludos.
@chillwann Hola Will, sorry for the inconvenience. We've replied your new DMs
@mediumjerome Hola Jerome, we've replied your DMs. Regards

@onamonapiamaria Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. In order to submit a formal complaint, please use our online form and attach the police report, along with a list of the missing objects and their values. If an 'error' pops up, please keep clicking on ''continue'' https://t.co/va7wYIeRZD

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @JJ_Mbanisi Hola Jennifer, we're sorry to read this and have replied your DM. Kind regards
@tragedy005 Hola, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your PIR code and full passenger name to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@MarkDou61478013 Hola Mark, thank you for contacting us, we have replied your DM. Regards
@dangillis Hola Daniel, since your Iberia flights were marketed with Finnair's (AY) flight number, you'll only be able to check-in at the airport tomorrow. Kind regards
@_nyrat Hola, hemos dado respuesta a tu DM, seguimos por esa vía, desde el perfil de Iberia. Saludos
@citrikp Hola. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...) https://t.co/HyIAB652lE
@NikolinaBrajov3 We're deeply sorry and have just replied your DM. We'll ask our colleagues to re-send the email to your address. Kind regards

@Its_Emma_Claire Hola Emma, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM your booking details, code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@hegarty_deirdre Chrome, might help as well. But it's important that you clear all cookies and accept them again. Kind regards

@hegarty_deirdre Hola Deirdre. Please make sure to clean all cookies from the browser's memory cache before trying again. As you could see on the screenshot we sent you yesterday, the voucher works when we use it at https://t.co/m6fyDyQyX2 . Using a different browser, like Edge or/1

urls.title: IBERIA.COM en United States - the best prices for Iberia flights
urls.description: Check the offers of cheap flights from the United States to more than 300 Iberia destinations in Spain, Europe, America and Asia, and reserve it at the best price

data.text: @JJ_Mbanisi Hola Jennifer, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your PIR code and full passenger name to verify your information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@kgwallo Hola Keith, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards
@nomyeongrey Hola Dakyung, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us all details by DM including your booking information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@RyYkMr Hola Ryosuke, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards
@babsie2810 Hola Barbara, we have replied your DM. Regards
@coreymast Hola Corey, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards

@TheRealGiovana Hola Gigi, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your booking details, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@cr12356789 Hola Joan, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards
@missmoparker Hola Morgan, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards
@DaniGarciaGonz Hola Daniela, ¿nos podrías pasar por DM, privado, el número de reclamación y el PIR de Iberia? Muchas gracias.
@El_Wifer Hola, we have replied your DM. Regards
@TonyaB75 Hello. We are very sorry for what you tell us. As we indicated through the DM you sent us, we hope you can receive your luggage soon. Kind regards.
@AndresFRial Hola Andrés, hemos revisado tu consulta por via privada. Nos gustaria seguir el hilo de la conversación por ese medio, quedamos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.

@El_Wifer Hola, we are truly sorry to read about that. Could you please, send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI) with any detail you could consider important so that we could review your case? We remain at your disposal. Regards.
@hegarty_deirdre We've just re-sent our last DM. Please check
@stepharteaga93 Hola Stephanie, we have replied your DM. Regards
@LOL_010Roffa Hola, we have replied your DM. Regards
@ClanDucks Hola Duck, we are reviewing your DM, we will continue the conversation there. Regards
@trevordarrell Hola Trevor, we have replied your DM, asking for some additional information. We will continue the conversation there, kind regards
@222gabbyb Hola Gabby, we are checking your DM. We will continue the conversation there. Regards
@hegarty_deirdre We've sent you a new DM

@leonardobaldi18 Sorry, but so far there isn't any confirmation about the bag's location, as stated on the tracing website we shared on our previous message. Once the bag has been located, you'll receive a SMS or email with further details
@leonardobaldi18 Hola, unfortunately, the bag still hasn't been located. Please use our tracing system to follow up https://t.co/P60eOiuUxP

@hegarty_deirdre is deducted from the total. So please don't move on with the purchase until the voucher really works. Right now, the voucher appears not be working from your end only. When we use it at https://t.co/m6fyDyQyX2 , it works and the voucher amount is deducted as it should

urls.title: IBERIA.COM en United States - the best prices for Iberia flights
urls.description: Check the offers of cheap flights from the United States to more than 300 Iberia destinations in Spain, Europe, America and Asia, and reserve it at the best price

data.text: @hegarty_deirdre We meant that the voucher amount is deducted from the total price, Deirdre. That's what we meant by ''the voucher works fine''. So please make sure to clear all cookies from the memory cache and try again at https://t.co/RZPjUXjhy8 . It will only work if the voucher amount /1

urls.title: IBERIA.COM in Ireland - The best prices for Iberia flights - Iberia
urls.description: Check our cheap flights offers from Ireland and fly to over 300 Iberia destinations in Spain, Europe, America and Africa, and book at the best price

data.text: @hegarty_deirdre We've replied your new DM. The voucher is working from our end, as shown on the screenshot we sent via DM
@hegarty_deirdre We already have the voucher code. Please send the DM with the required informations
@brueckenpepe Thank you, we are checking your DM. We will continue the conversation there. Kind regards
@MaryamQ93833770 Hola Maryam, we're sorry to read this and hope you are recovering well. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and email address https://t.co/HyIAB652lE
@JEaton53650901 Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR (property irregularity report) reference number https://t.co/HyIAB652lE
@Glenn97571945 Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. We've just replied your DM. Please check and point out which booking you want to keep. Kind regards
@hegarty_deirdre Please send us a DM with the exact flights and dates you want to book, so we can try to reproduce the error https://t.co/HyIAB652lE
@RyYkMr Hola, sorry for the delay. We've replied your DM
@hegarty_deirdre Unfortunately, it's not possible to use the voucher over the phone. Please try again with a different browser or device, after cleaning all cookies

@BrianFarley5_1 Hola Brian, sorry for the inconvenience. We've replied your DMs. Notice that not all ticket categories generate Avios. More infos at https://t.co/s8uummT5UT (click on ''see Avios table''). Kind regards

urls.title: Iberia L.A.E.
urls.description: Iberia L.A.E. Online information about flight times, arrivals, departures, flight bookings, baggage and online check-in.

data.text: @MaxGadeyne Hola Gadeyne's, thank you for contacting us,  if your flight is delayed and you lose the connection flight, please contact our desk agents at the airport to help you with the available options. Any question, please let us know by DM. Regards https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@DavidWa53158736 Hola , thank you for contacting us, could you please share us by DM your Iberia Plus number, full passenger name and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@ItsonlyMaximil1 Hola, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM  your PIR code and full passenger name of your baggage claim to verify the information? Thanks in advance
@PatriciaPrins Hola Patricia, sentimos la demora en responder, estamos ahora contigo por DM. Gracias.
@CTEPremium Hola Agiito, thank you for contacting us, could you please tell us by DM all details of your inquiry? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@grandolaplastic Hola, thank you for contacting us, could you please tell us by DM all details of your search, if you have tried to delete your cache and cookies browser and try it through the incognito mode? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@MaddalenaNicola Hola MAddalena, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your PIR code and full passenger name to verify the process? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@LopezMeglopez4 Hola Megan, we are sorry to read this, could you please tell us by DM all details of your situation, if you opened the formal complaint at the airport and have the PIR code? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Glenn97571945 Hola Glenn, we have replied your DM with your booking details. Kind regards

@jagatanunez Hola Jag, sentimos leer sobre ello, puedes presentar un reporte aquí https://t.co/n2GuVlvt2j normalmente, pasadas unas 24 horas se reflejaría el reporte en sistema de existir coincidencia, se te enviará un mail para informarte. Saludos

urls.title: Foundspot - La plataforma de Iberia para recuperar tu objeto perdido
urls.description: Foundspot es un servicio gratuito que conecta automáticamente a personas que han perdido su mascota o cualquier objeto con quien lo ha encontrado.

data.text: @TonyaB75 We send you a new DM. Regards.
@YousefH You're welcome, Yousef :)
@YousefH Hello. We have requested some information through the DM you sent us. We will be attentive to your response. Kind regards.
@TonyaB75 We have sent you a new DM. Kind regards.
@TonyaB75 Hello. We have requested some information from you in the first comment you posted. We will be attentive to your response. Kind regards.
@TonyaB75 Hello. We are sorry for the inconvenience that has arisen. please send us an MD with your PIR reference code and the full name associated with the claim. Kind regards.

@chillwann Hello, Will. We are very sorry for the incident with your luggage. Did you file a claim at the airport? Do you have a PIR reference code? Please let us know all the details in a DM. We will be attentive to your response. Kind regards.
@stepharteaga93 Hello. We have responded to your query through a direct message. Kind regards.
@QuinnMaroney1 Thank you for confirming us, we have requested additional information through our private conversation. Regards.

@PoopsVincenzo Hola, we are sorry to read your comments. Let us know by DM if there is anything we can assist you with from this department. We will review and tell you how to proceed. Kind regards
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
